img_text: 19:34 Touch to return to call 30:21 e Verizon Josh @deadmemes21 ok my messages won't deliver to u but i want to make plans with u just because i think it'll be easier for us to be better friends that way?? idk just let me know when ur free or something. or not if u don't want to. also we still need to binge watch stuff 7/18/17, 00:42 i'm free all week 7/18/17, 10:36 okay good 7/18/17, 11:06 can i go to ur house friday sometime? 7/18/17, 11:11 GIF| Start a message
